title: Activist coordinates planetary climate strike
content:
Scenario: Activist coordinates planetary climate strike
    Given youth activists worldwide demand emergency climate action
    And they want coordinated strikes across all continents
    When the network establishes a coordinated action date
    And local groups plan context-appropriate actions
    And the coordination respects different hemispheres, cultures, and capacities
    Then each community organizes autonomously within global framework
    And the translation agents enable real-time cross-language coordination
    And traditional media amplification is earned through demonstrated scale
    And the collective action maintains coherence without centralized control
    And impact is measured through network-wide participation tracking
    And the strike demonstrates viable model for global coordination
